name: v2.16.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.16.0")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "fc8fe1be58ae39f84a8613d554534760c7f0819d407afcc98bbcbd990523bfed",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.16.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.16.0/bazel-lib-v2.16.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

```



## What's Changed
* chore: update bsdtar to latest by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1080
* feat(mtree_mutate): Adding Support for Group / GID to mtree_mutate by @ajrpeggio in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1082

## New Contributors
* @ajrpeggio made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1082

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/compare/v2.15.3...v2.16.0

## What's Changed
* fix(tar): handle directories with spaces in name by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/984
* feat: bats_test: add junit report to test results by @pjjw in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/982
* docs: Update jq docs to show correct escaping by @ChrisChinchilla in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/983
* refactor: Fix no-else-after-return by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/988
* fix: honor umask in write_source_file by @sitaktif in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/986
* fix: Disable the non-deterministic time header when using gzip compression by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/989
* fix(deps): update module golang.org/x/sys to v0.28.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/981
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v7.4.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/971
* fix(bats_test): use env var rather than symbolic link by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/991
* chore(deps): Enable renovate for pre-commit by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/994
* chore: start testing on Bazel 8 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/972
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook keith/pre-commit-buildifier to v7 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1000
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook pre-commit/pre-commit-hooks to v5 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1001
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook commitizen-tools/commitizen to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/999
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.28.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/997
* feat(bzlmod): mark toolchains extension as reproducible by @cerisier in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/970
* feat: Forward RunEnvironmentInfo if present by @molar in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1008
* ci(pre-commit): Add pre-commit CI job by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1002
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v8 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/1004
* fix(tar): handle strip_prefix of root directory in mtree_mutate by @j-eid in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/pull/995

```starlark
load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

```

name: v2.7.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.7.1")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "b554eb7942a5ab44c90077df6a0c76fc67c5874c9446a007e9ba68be82bd4796",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.7.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.7.1/bazel-lib-v2.7.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

```



## What's Changed
* chore: bump to bsdtar-prebuilt 3.7.2-1 binaries for linux and darwin by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/pull/819


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/compare/v2.7.0...v2.7.1

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "1.42.3")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "d0529773764ac61184eb3ad3c687fb835df5bee01afedf07f0cf1a45515c96bc",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-1.42.3",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/releases/download/v1.42.3/bazel-lib-v1.42.3.tar.gz",

```

Optional toolchains:

```starlark
# Register the following toolchain to use jq

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "register_jq_toolchains")

register_jq_toolchains()

# Register the following toolchain to use yq

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "register_yq_toolchains")

register_yq_toolchains()
```


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/compare/v142.2...v1.42.3

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_bazel_lib", version = "2.7.0")
```

> Read more about bzlmod: <https://blog.aspect.dev/bzlmod>

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "357dad9d212327c35d9244190ef010aad315e73ffa1bed1a29e20c372f9ca346",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.7.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.7.0/bazel-lib-v2.7.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()

```



## What's Changed
* feat: add //lib:enable_runfiles config_setting by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/pull/807
* feat: add get_home_directory to repo_utils by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/pull/809
* feat: export utils from //lib:utils.bzl to match repo_utils and platform_utils by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/pull/810
* feat: add platform_transition_test by @lamcw in https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/pull/770

## New Contributors
* @lamcw made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/pull/770

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/bazel-lib/compare/v2.6.1...v2.7.0
